info.title: LeapAS API
info.description: Move your app forward with the LeapAS API

get.summary: Count the installations which match the query condition.
get.description: User can get the counts of installations which match the query condtion.

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The query statement which be included in the content of installations.

get.description: Get the user information by id

post.summary: Get a mobilePhone message with captcha.
post.description: User can get a mobilePhone message with captcha by posting a mobilePhone number.

parameters.name: X-LAS-AppId
parameters.description: the unique ID number of application.

200.description: The response of posting the captcha.

post.summary: Verify the mobilePhone number and captcha.
post.description: User can verify the mobilePhone number and captcha.

parameters.name: X-LAS-AppId
parameters.description: the unique ID number of application.

200.description: the result of verifying the mobilePhone and captcha.

400.description: Bad Request, the captcha is wrong or overdue.

post.description: If user want to login with mobilePhone and captcha, it can get the captcha using this api

parameters.name: X-LAS-AppId
parameters.description: the unique ID number of application.

200.description: the result of get the captcha of logining.

post.description: User can login with the captcha which is right and valid.

parameters.name: X-LAS-AppId
parameters.description: the unique ID number of application.

200.description: An recorded information of logining with mobilePhone and captcha.

400.description: Bad Request, the captcha is wrong or overdue.

post.description: In order to finish the register, user can get the captcha of registering actively.

parameters.name: X-LAS-AppId
parameters.description: the unique ID number of application.

put.description: User can verify the captcha actively.

parameters.name: X-LAS-AppId
parameters.description: the unique ID number of application.

200.description: The result of verifying the captcha.

400.description: Bad Request, the captcha is wrong or overdue.

post.summary: Get the captcha of reseting password.
post.description: According to this api, user can get the captcha of reseting password.

parameters.name: X-LAS-AppId
parameters.description: the unique ID number of application.

put.description: According to this api, user can reset the password with SmsCode.

parameters.name: X-LAS-AppId
parameters.description: the unique ID number of application.

200.description: The result of verifying the captcha.

400.description: Bad Request, the captcha is wrong or overdue.

get.description: get  metadata of specific one with X-LAS-Fid or all files.

post.description: Create an new marketing task which can be InApp or Push type. And can set different status,just like Active(1),Deactivated(2),Expired(3),Scheduled(4),Completed(5),Error(100).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of new Marketing Task.

200.description: the objectId Number and createdAt time of new Marketing Task.

get.description: Can get a campaignList which include of all marketing tasks' contents.

post.summary: Push Marketing Message by Google Service
post.description: In Maxleap.com environment, users can push marketing message by google service with deviceToken.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: user should provide deviceToken and the content of push message.

get.summary: According to objectId, user get the content of one marketing task.
get.description: According to objectid, user can get the content of one marketing task.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: An unique id number of Marketing Task.

200.description: the content of one marketing task with this objectId.

put.summary: According to objectId, user can update the content of one marketing task.
put.description: According to objectId, user can update the content of one marketing task.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: An unique id number of Marketing Task.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the content of updated Marketing Task

200.description: The result of update Marketing Task.

delete.summary: According to objectId, user can delete the marketing task.
delete.description: According to objectId, user can delete the marketing task.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: An unique id number of Marketing Task.

200.description: The result of delete Marketing Task.

put.summary: Update the status of this marketing campaign.
put.description: User can update the status of this marketing campaign by puting the content of status. And the status include of 'Draft(0),Active(1),Deactivated(2),Expired(3),Scheduled(4),Completed(5),Error(100)'.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: An unique id number of marketing campaign.

200.description: The result of update marketing campaign's status.

put.summary: Change the marketing campaign to archived.
put.description: Change the marketing campaign to archived. And the archived&un-archived just is the tags.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: An unique id number of marketing campaign.

200.description: the result of change the marketing campaign to archived.

put.summary: Change the marketing campaign to un-archived.
put.description: Change the marketing campaign to un-archived. And the archived&un-archived just is the tags.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: An unique id number of Marketing Task.

200.description: the result of change the marketing campaign to un-archived.

post.summary: According to the 'installId', SDK can check which In-app conforms to itself.
post.description: User make many In-app marketing campaigns, SDK can get campaignList which include of conform campaigns by installId.

get.summary: Count the marketing campaign which match the query condition.
get.description: User can get the counts of marketing campaign which match the query condtion.

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The query statement which be included in the content of marketing campaign.

200.description: The result of counting marketing campaign.

post.summary: SDK send the event to analysis api.
post.description: SDK can send differente eventType to analysis api which can count the quantity of events.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The request content which be sent to analysis api.

post.summary: User can update the appleConfig or gcmConfig.
post.description: In US server, user can update the appleConfig or gcmConfig by this api;In CN server, user just should update the appleConfig.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The Key of appleConfig or gcmConfig.

post.description: On the marketing campaign, User can copy an new another.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: An unique id number of marketing campaign.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: User should pull the name of copy marketing campaign.

200.description: The result of copy marketing campaign.

get.description: The Android Push SDK should hold an socket with Marketing Push Server, firstly the SDK get address of Comet which is the Service Node of Marketing Push Server.The address is Array.

parameters.name: k
parameters.description: SDK auto-create an Key which can be to discriminate every client by comet.

get.description: The Android Push SDK will reconnect the comet, and firstly it will get the Offline Messages from Marketing Push Server.

parameters.name: k
parameters.description: SDK auto-create an Key which can be to discriminate every client by comet.

parameters.name: m
parameters.description: Time Series(Get all Offline Messages when m=0).

200.description: the json format of OfflineMessage file

get.description: The Android Push SDK can get the server's time by this API.

parameters.name: cb
parameters.description: The Android Push SDK can pull an string that can be the key of the server's time.

post.summary: load section by Query with Post method

get.summary: Find All the app's item Matchs The Query
get total count of faq item
Find All the tags Matchs The Query
get all Issues that match the Query object

post.description: this implement only used for web console.

post.summary: get total number of Issue that match the query

get.summary: get all smart view tha match the query object
Get the number of messages with this status.
get.description: App developer can get the number of messages with this status.

200.description: the count of messages with this status.

get.summary: Get a list of messages with this type.
get.description: According to the type, app developer can get a list of message with this type,following the 'limit'&'skip' properties.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: the list number of one page.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: the start number of this page.

200.description: the result about a list of messages.

get.summary: Get the details of message with this id.
get.description: According to the objectId, app developer can get the details of this message.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the unique Id number of message.

200.description: The result about the details of message.

delete.summary: Delete the message with this id.
delete.description: According to the objectId, app developer can delete the message.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the unique Id number of message.

200.description: The result about deleting this message.

put.summary: Edit the status of message with this id.
put.description: According to the id, app developer can edit the status of this message.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the unique Id number of message.

200.description: the result of enabling organization users.

put.summary: Batch edit the status of message with these ids.
put.description: According to these ids, app developer can edit the status of these messages.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the request body about status and ids.

200.description: the result of enabling organization users.

post.summary: Batch delete these messages with ids.
post.description: According to these ids, app developer can batch delete these messsages.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the request body about these ids of messages.

200.description: The result of activating organization users.

post.description: SDK platform can do payment operation by using this api.

parameters.name: X-LAS-AppId
parameters.description: An unique ID number of application.

post.description: Console can query payment by using this api. According to the content of request,  it can get an array of payments with these conditions.

parameters.name: X-LAS-AppId
parameters.description: An unique ID number of application.

200.description: An array of payments with these conditions.

uuid.description: the unique number differentiate every pull actions.

osVersion.description: the osVersion of android or IOS.

billNum.description: An unique ID number of payment on one SDK platform.

id.description: An unique ID number of payment.
